entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.1°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: ENE 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
